overview: "Love Is A Number Of Keys" is a story about Jyun; living alone for the first time and becoming an assistant apartment manager. He soon finds out, by being a peeping tom mind you, that this particular apartment services sex to people. The ladies do this out of enjoyment, and Sumire (senior manager and A-class sex fiend herself) trusts him with this secret!
tagline: Ai wa Kagi no Kazu dake… Fuuzoku Mansion
title: Love Is the Number of Keys
